Posts.Content: Mar 16, 2012 06:09PM CLP821 wrote: Hi Kim, Were you told to come back for a biopsy and do you have any sort of palpable lump? From what you said they see something on ultrasound but seem to think that it's not something to be concerned about. Did either of them mention a fibroadenoma or cyst? I've had both and they often appear as round or oval masses on ultrasound. When are expected to get the results? I hope you find out soon and that it's benign.  In the meantime try to keep busy and not worry too much...easier said than done, I know. Christine
Posts.Title: SHould I still be worried? Kim1966 Kim1966
